SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.board.model.dao.BoardDAO#selectTotalCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARD A
JOIN TBL_CATEGORY B ON(A.CATEGORY_CODE = B.CATEGORY_CODE)
JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON(A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO)
B.CATEGORY_NAME = #{ searchValue }
B.NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
A.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
A.BOARD_BODY LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
AND A.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.board.model.dao.BoardDAO#selectBoardList() */ A.RNUM , A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_TYPE , A.CATEGORY_CODE , D.CATEGORY_NAME , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_BODY , A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , E.NICKNAME , A.BOARD_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , A.BOARD_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TYPE , B.CATEGORY_CODE , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_BODY , B.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.BOARD_COUNT , B.CREATED_DATE , B.BOARD_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.BOARD_NO , C.BOARD_TYPE , C.CATEGORY_CODE , C.BOARD_TITLE , C.BOARD_BODY , C.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , C.BOARD_COUNT , C.CREATED_DATE , C.BOARD_STATUS FROM TBL_BOARD C
JOIN TBL_CATEGORY D ON(C.CATEGORY_CODE = D.CATEGORY_CODE)
JOIN TBL_MEMBER D ON(C.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = D.MEMBER_NO)
D.CATEGORY_NAME = #{ searchValue }
D.NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
C.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
C.BOARD_BODY LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
AND C.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y'
ORDER BY C.BOARD_NO DESC ) B
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{ endRow }
) A JOIN TBL_CATEGORY D ON (A.CATEGORY_CODE = D.CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN TBL_MEMBER E ON(A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = E.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.RNUM >= #{ startRow } ORDER BY A.RNUM

SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.board.model.dao.BoardDAO#selectThumbnailList() */ A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_TITLE , B.CATEGORY_NAME , C.NICKNAME , A.BOARD_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , D.ATTACHMENT_NO , D.ORIGINAL_NAME , D.SAVED_NAME , D.SAVE_PATH , D.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM TBL_BOARD A JOIN TBL_CATEGORY B ON (A.CATEGORY_CODE = B.CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN TBL_MEMBER C ON (A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) JOIN TBL_ATTACHMENT D ON (A.BOARD_NO = D.REF_BOARD_NO) WHERE A.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND D.ATTACHMENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND D.FILE_TYPE = 'TITLE' ORDER BY A.BOARD_NO DESC

mapper.select: SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.board.model.dao.BoardDAO#selectOneThumbnailBoard() */ A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_BODY , B.CATEGORY_NAME , A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , C.NICKNAME , A.BOARD_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , A.MODIFIED_DATE , D.ATTACHMENT_NO , D.ORIGINAL_NAME , D.SAVED_NAME , D.SAVE_PATH , D.FILE_TYPE , D.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM TBL_BOARD A JOIN TBL_CATEGORY B ON (A.CATEGORY_CODE = B.CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN TBL_MEMBER C ON (A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) JOIN TBL_ATTACHMENT D ON (A.BOARD_NO = D.REF_BOARD_NO) WHERE A.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND D.ATTACHMENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.BOARD_NO = #{ no }
